E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/29/1975
Subject: Progress of Dennis Lewallyn
Dear Sir,
Dennis Lewallyn has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an ERA of 2.56 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
